name: OR_CASE_PROVIDED_DOCS
description: This table contains information from the Documents Provided (I ORC 7690) item.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROVIDED_DOCUMENT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to indicate documents that should be provided to a patient.
